mapper.select: select d.id as deptId ,d.dept_name ,u.id as userId ,u.real_name as userRealName ,r.id as roleId ,r.role_cn_name as roleCnName from sys_dept d left join sys_dept_role dr on d.id = dr.dept_id left join sys_role r on dr.role_id = r.id left join sys_user u on u.dept_id = d.id and u.email=d.email where 1=1 and r.role_code=#{roleId} and d.id=#{deptId}
select * from sys_dept d left join ba_dept_customer dc on d.id = dc.dept_id where dc.customer_id=#{customerId}
